urlLink swishzone.com I downloaded the free demo version of Swish the other day. It's an excellent tool for creating some quite impressive flash animations without having fork out for Flash MX. I have used Flash MX before, and it is definitely not the most user friendly bit of software available - it is very powerfull, but has a steep learning curve for new users. Swish however is so easy and intuitive to use, that even a relative novice can be creating Flash animations after about an hour of playing around with it.
